## rxReadAuthoringTypes() function

Reads the authoring types from a directory

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function rxReadAuthoringTypes(aRoot: string, aTree: ReadDirectory): Observable<JsonEntryMap<AuthoringType>>;
```
